content: The Kingdom of Sahali is a Chapter 2 Secret area that can only be accessed by meeting the Yellow-Robed Square in Fright Cliff (aka the Drunken Boar), and helping him in his search for the "Realm of Gold" which requires a few steps (and for you to best him in combat).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fuban.md', within the main section titled 'Fuban', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
The Kingdom of Sahali is a Chapter 2 Secret area that can only be accessed by meeting the Yellow-Robed Square in Fright Cliff (aka the Drunken Boar), and helping him in his search for the "Realm of Gold" which requires a few steps (and for you to best him in combat).
